name: CASA: How we help get to the next billion through specs!
description: Standards help bring some normalcy to our space and help propel efforts for mass adoption into web3. CASA is a standards body that aims to make it easier to do that and invites anyone to be a part of the conversation.

speakers.name: Hassan Malik
speakers.bio: Hassan is a Senior Software Engineer @ MetaMask Snaps. He is also the chair of the JSON RPC working group at CASA. He's been in web3 for five years and previously worked at AirSwap.
